name: Clownfish
description: Bright orange with white stripes, clownfish live among sea anemones.

name: Blue Tang
description: Known for its deep blue color and oval body, made famous by 'Dory'.

name: Dolphin
description: Highly intelligent marine mammals known for their playful nature.

name: Sea Turtle
description: Gentle swimmers that glide through oceans with grace and endurance.

name: Octopus
description: Eight-armed and incredibly smart, capable of camouflage and problem-solving.

name: Starfish
description: Radiating arms and the ability to regenerate lost limbs make them unique.

name: Jellyfish
description: Graceful but dangerous, jellyfish float with pulsating movements.

name: Seahorse
description: Small upright-swimming creatures known for their curled tails and unique shape.

name: Sea Lion
description: Playful and vocal marine mammals often seen basking on rocky shores.

name: Lobster
description: Hard-shelled ocean bottom dwellers with strong claws and segmented bodies.

name: Manta Ray
description: Gentle giants of the sea, known for their graceful gliding through deep waters.

name: Moray Eel
description: Long, snake-like predators that lurk in coral crevices and ambush prey.

name: Crab
description: Side-walking scavengers with strong pincers and a protective shell.

name: Sea Urchin
description: Spiny sea creatures that play an important role in reef ecosystems.

name: Orca (Killer Whale)
description: Powerful predators and social creatures, famous for their intelligence and teamwork.

name: Sea Cucumber
description: Soft-bodied and slow-moving, they help clean the seafloor naturally.

name: Barracuda
description: Fast, fierce predators with a torpedo-like body and sharp teeth.

name: Squid
description: Masters of jet propulsion and camouflage, with long tentacles and big eyes.

name: Anglerfish
description: Deep-sea dwellers with a glowing lure to attract prey in the dark ocean depths.

name: Beluga Whale
description: Friendly white whales known as 'sea canaries' due to their melodic vocalizations.

name: Sea Otter
description: Playful sea mammals known for floating on their backs and using tools to open shells.

name: Humpback Whale
description: Massive ocean wanderers known for breaching and melodic songs echoing through the sea.

name: Hammerhead Shark
description: Easily recognized by their hammer-shaped heads, enhancing their sensory range.

name: Sea Snake
description: Highly venomous marine reptiles with paddle-like tails for swimming.

name: Coral
description: Not just colorful rocks—corals are living animals that build vibrant reef ecosystems.

name: Sea Horse
description: Gentle swimmers with curled tails, known for the male carrying the babies.

name: Nudibranch
description: Colorful sea slugs with stunning patterns found on coral reefs.

name: Manatee
description: Gentle herbivores called 'sea cows', slowly grazing in warm coastal waters.

name: Pufferfish
description: Inflates like a balloon when threatened, and some species are highly toxic.

name: Sea Pen
description: Feather-like colonial animals anchored in soft seabeds, glowing under UV light.

name: Electric Eel
description: A powerful eel capable of generating electric shocks to navigate and hunt.

name: Leafy Seadragon
description: Delicate creatures with leaf-like fins that offer perfect underwater camouflage.

name: Giant Isopod
description: Deep-sea scavengers resembling oversized pillbugs with armored shells.

name: Blue Ringed Octopus
description: Small but extremely venomous, known for its glowing blue rings.

name: Giant Squid
description: Elusive deep-sea giants with enormous tentacles and mysterious behavior.

name: Sunfish (Mola Mola)
description: Massive ocean drifters with a flat body and calm, gentle nature.

name: Ribbon Eel
description: Vibrant blue and yellow eels known for their striking ribbon-like bodies.

name: Sea Angel
description: Transparent, winged sea slugs that glide gracefully through icy waters.

name: Goblin Shark
description: A rare deep-sea shark with a long snout and extendable jaws.

name: Flying Fish
description: Known for gliding above the ocean surface with wing-like fins.

name: Sea Spider
description: Creepy-cool creatures with long legs and small bodies living in icy waters.

name: Whale Shark
description: The largest fish in the ocean, gentle filter-feeders covered in white spots.

name: Portuguese Man O' War
description: A floating colony of organisms with venomous tentacles.

name: Sea Hare
description: Soft, slow-moving herbivores that release purple ink when threatened.

name: Batfish
description: Odd-shaped, bottom-dwelling fish that ‘walk’ on the seafloor.

name: Water Flea
description: Tiny plankton-like critters essential for freshwater ecosystems.

name: Sea Gooseberry
description: Transparent jelly-like creatures with glowing comb-like rows.

name: Blacktip Shark
description: Fast, agile reef sharks known for black-tipped fins.

name: Sea Moth
description: Small armored fish with wing-like fins that mimic the seafloor.

name: Horseshoe Crab
description: Ancient marine creatures known for their blue blood and hard shells.

name: Cookiecutter Shark
description: Small sharks that take perfectly round bites out of larger animals.

name: Cuttlefish
description: Masters of color change with expressive eyes and floating movements.

name: Arctic Char
description: Cold-water fish with shimmering pink-orange bodies.

name: Oarfish
description: Long ribbon-like fish believed to be the origin of sea serpent legends.

name: Frogfish
description: Strange ambush predators that blend perfectly into corals.

name: Sea Whip
description: Graceful, whip-like corals swaying with underwater currents.

name: Box Jellyfish
description: One of the most venomous sea creatures with transparent cube-shaped bodies.

name: Stingray
description: Flat-bodied ocean gliders with a sharp defensive tail spine.

name: Copepod
description: Tiny plankton species forming the base of many ocean food chains.
